message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it's worth every penny of its true worth, which is $12000 to you. However, I understand budgets and considerations vary, so I'm offering you the opportunity to secure this remarkable item at a special introductory price of $9500. This is an exclusive offer tailored to appreciate your interest and commitment to excellence. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly extraordinary.
